name: Everything Will Be OK
summary:
Plot Keywords: Neurology | Psychology | Experimental Film | Surrealism | Dream 
　　Trivia 
　　Almost every scene in the short splits the screen up into multiple moving "windows". The whole movie and all of its special effects were photographed and carefully composited "in camera" - no CG was used in the production. 
　　Sound Mix: Dolby Digital 
　　Color: Color 
　　Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 
　　A series of dark and troubling events forces Bill to reckon with the meaning of his life - or lack thereof.
info:
